CustomField.formula:
IF( OR( CONTAINS( Account.Name, "Law"), CONTAINS( Account.Name, "Firm"), CONTAINS( Account.Name, "Attorney"), CONTAINS( Account.Name, "Legal"), CONTAINS( Account.Name, "Office"), CONTAINS( Account.Name, "Mediation"), CONTAINS( Account.Name, "Lawyer"), CONTAINS( Account.Name, "law"), CONTAINS( Account.Name, "firm"), CONTAINS( Account.Name, "attorney"), CONTAINS( Account.Name, "legal"), CONTAINS( Account.Name, "office"), CONTAINS( Account.Name, "lawyer") ),
TRUE, FALSE)
CustomField.label: Firm Name Keyword
